trans-unit.source: Provides a selection list adapter class for the XHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供 XHTML 配接器集的選擇清單配接器類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The control adapters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace provide XHTML rendering and processing for mobile controls on a variety of display devices.
trans-unit.target: 中的控制項配接器<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters>命名空間提供 XHTML 轉譯和處理上各種不同顯示裝置的行動控制項。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlSelectionListAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlSelectionListAdapter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回關聯控制項的強型別參考。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the control, which is used as a key into the postback data for the state of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的 ID，可在回傳資料中當做控制項狀態的索引鍵使用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> object containing the current selected state of the child elements for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> 物件，包含控制項子項目的目前選取狀態。

trans-unit.source: An array of the indexes of selected items from the previous request.
trans-unit.target: 前一個要求之選取項目的索引陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the list of selected items has changed since the last request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示選取之項目的清單自上次要求後已變更，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the adapter has changed the selected state of any item during the current request.
trans-unit.target: 指出配接器是否在目前的要求期間，變更任何項目的選取狀態。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the adapter handles loading the postback data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果配接器會處理載入回傳資料則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: True
trans-unit.target: True

trans-unit.source: Renders the control and its content on the client using the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> 物件，在用戶端上呈現控制項和其內容。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Renders hidden field text for a control.
trans-unit.target: 呈現控制項的隱藏欄位文字。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。
